need_to_sign_in: You need an account to play! Please sign in.
header_description: Distributed Chess — Play many games against many players.
wait_for_opponent_to_move:
No games are currently available for you to play.
Please wait for an opponent to make a move.
wrong_side_message: You are already playing the other side of this game, so you must wait for an opponenet to play before you can make a move.
invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address.
username_too_short: Username must be at least 3 characters long.
password_too_short: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
username_in_use: That username is in use. Please choose a different one.
bad_login:
Username or password not correct.
Please try again, or use the "Forgot Password" button if you need to.
gdpr_message:
Thanks Europe, for all the useful legislation, and for making our lives better, one mountain of red tape at a time!
Please don't sue me.
win_message:
CHECKMATE! You've won the game for your team!
Your rating has increased by __ratingDelta__ points, and the ratings of your teammates and opponents have all been adjusted accordingly.
draw_message:
It's a draw.
Your rating has changed by __ratingDelta__ points, and the ratings of your teammates and opponents have all been adjusted accordingly.
email_in_use:
This email address is already in use.
Please choose a differnt one, or use the "Forgot passowrd" button.
pass_once_or_ignore_permanently: Do you wish to pass your turn just this one time, or would you prefer to ignore this game forever?
no_game_history: You have not yet played any games.
flag_reason: Please tell us what you found offensive about this comment.
comment_flagged: Thanks for your feedback. We will review this comment.
password_reset_success: You have successfully changed your password.
